Constructor Detail

Level

private Level()
This constructor is Private so there can not be an instance of the Level class. All of the methods of this class are static.

Method Detail

gameObjects

public static java.util.ArrayList<GameObject> gameObjects()
This getter method is used to retrieve the list of GameObjects for the level.

Returns:
The ArrayList of GameObjects for the currently loaded level.

The currently loaded GameLevelMap object.

location

public static GameLocation location(java.lang.String locationName)
This getter method is used to retrieve a single GameLocation from the game objects list that has the name specified.

Parameters:
locationName - The String name of the location to retrieve.
Returns:
The GameLocation object that has the specified name, or null if none is found.

setupLevel

public static void setupLevel()
This method is used to create a GameLevelMap to be loaded and to display the initial output for it.

reset

public static void reset()
This method is used to reset the the Level back to an unloaded state. It will present the user the option to reload it or to quit the game.
